cards.name: Empty Bottle
cards.description:
Retain.
Deal 2 (4) damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Lost Child
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 25 Gold.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Calcium Deficiency
cards.description: At the end of the turn, lose 3 Calcium.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 (8) Block.

cards.name: One-Two Punch
cards.description: Deal 4 (6) damage twice.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 (9) damage.

cards.name: Stronger Bones
cards.description: Gain 5 (7) Calcium.

cards.name: Anticipate
cards.description: Next turn gain 10 (14) Block.

cards.name: Bucket Headbutt
cards.description:
Gain 7 (10) Block.
Deal 1 (4) damage.

cards.name: Bucket Strike
cards.description: Deal 12 (16) damage.

cards.name: Bucket Swing
cards.description: Deal 14 (18) damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Cappuccino
cards.description:
Gain 2 (3) Calcium.
Gain [E] ( [E]) next turn.

cards.name: Cool Glass
cards.description:
Gain 1 Thorns.
Gain 1 Plated Armor (Metallicize).

cards.name: Cross Arms
cards.description: Gain 2 (4) Block twice.

cards.name: Duck and Dive
cards.description:
Gain 8 (12) Block.
Next turn gain 8 (12) Block.

cards.name: Espresso
cards.description: Next turn gain [E] ( [E]).

cards.name: Flick Milk Top
cards.description:
Deal 5 (8) damage. When the target dies, add this card to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Glass Cut
cards.description:
Gain 1 Thorns.
Deal 2 (5) damage.
Apply 2 (3) Weak.

cards.name: Gut Punch
cards.description:
Deal 6 (9) damage.
Enemy loses 1 Strength.

cards.name: Knuckle Sandwich
cards.description:
Deal 22 (27) damage.
Next turn, target gains 3 temporary Strength and 3 Block.

cards.name: Lactokinesis
cards.description: Gain 13 (16) Block. If you play a Milk card while this card is in your hand, it costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Milk Coating
cards.description:
Gain 9 (12) Block.
Gain 2 (3) Calcium.
Add an Empty Bottle to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Milk Snort
cards.description:
Enemy loses 7 (10) Strength this turn.
Add an Empty Bottle to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Milk Spill
cards.description:
Apply 2 (3) Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Add an Empty Bottle to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Milk Splash
cards.description:
Deal 8 (11) damage to ALL enemies.
Add an Empty Bottle to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Nap
cards.description: Next turn draw 1 (2) more card (cards).

cards.name: Rattle Mailbox
cards.description:
Deal 8 (11) damage.
Apply 3 (5) Deliverance.

cards.name: Shatter Glass
cards.description: Gain 4 (6) Thorns.

cards.name: Spare Tire
cards.description:
Retain.
Draw 2 (3) cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Thick Skull
cards.description:
Gain 3 (4) Block.
If you have at least 1 Calcium, gain 6 (9) additional Block.

cards.name: Around the Houses
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards per enemy.
Exhaust. (Innate.)

cards.name: Bully
cards.description:
Gain 2 Calcium.
Apply 1 (2) Weak to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Calcitrate
cards.description:
Deal 8 (12) damage.
Deals additional damage equal to Calcium gained this combat.

cards.name: Churn
cards.description: Gain 1 (2) Calcium, then draw 1 card for each Calcium you have.

cards.name: Controlled Intake
cards.description: Gain 3 (4) Calcium X times.

cards.name: Crème de la Crème
cards.description: Whenever you play a Milk card, Upgrade ALL cards in your hand for the rest of this combat.

cards.name: Discount Dairy
cards.description:
Add X (+1) random Milk cards to your hand. They cost 0 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Double Cream
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage twice.
Gain 1 Strength.

cards.name: Fortified Calcium
cards.description: At the end of your turn, gain Block equal to your Calcium. (Gain 3 Calcium.)

cards.name: Freshness
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Heal 5 (7) HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Glass Bank
cards.description: Gain 1 Thorns for every 5 (4) cards in your draw pile.

cards.name: Good Night's Rest
cards.description: Next turn draw 4 (5) more cards.

cards.name: Growth Spurt
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain X Calcium (and X Block).

cards.name: Kick The Bucket
cards.description:
Retain.
Deal 25 (32) damage.

cards.name: Lactose Intolerance
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage. Whenever you attack this enemy, it loses 2 HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mark Door
cards.description:
Apply 10 (99) Deliverance to an enemy.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Milkman's Rounds
cards.description: Shuffle 5 random Milk cards into your draw pile.

cards.name: Missing Person
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Shuffle 1 Lost Child into your discard pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Morning Rounds
cards.description: At the start of your turn, ALL enemies with less than 1 Deliverance have their Deliverance increased to 1.

cards.name: Preserve
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Gain 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Reflective Surface
cards.description:
Gain Block equal to the target's Block.
If the target has no Block, double your Block instead.

cards.name: Refrigerate
cards.description:
Gain 2 Block.
Gain 2 Metallicize.
Gain 2 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Repeat On
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage X  (+ 1 )  (+ 2 )  (+ 3 )  (+ 4 )  (+ 5 )  (+ 6 )  (+ 7 )  (+ 8 )  (+ 9 ) times.
Can be Upgraded any number of times.

cards.name: Safekeeping
cards.description: Gain Block next turn equal to your current Block.

cards.name: Shield of Shards
cards.description: Whenever you gain Thorns, gain 1 Plated Armor (Metallicize).

cards.name: Skimming Process
cards.description:
Exhaust your hand.
Add 1 random Milk card to your hand for each Exhausted card.

cards.name: Skull Crack
cards.description:
Lose 5 health, unless you have at least 3 (2) Calcium.
Deal 9 (14) damage.

cards.name: Supersize
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 1 (2) Max HP.

cards.name: Udder
cards.description: Add 3 random Milk cards to your hand.

cards.name: Waste Not
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 5 Block. Whenever you play a card, increase Block amount by 1 (2) this combat.

cards.name: Work Out
cards.description:
Gain 2 (1) Weak.
Gain 2 (1) Vulnerable.
Gain 2 Strength.
Gain 2 Dexterity.

cards.name: Bottle Holder
cards.description:
Add Empty Bottles to your hand until your hand is full.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Curdle
cards.description:
Gain 20 (25) Block.
Gain 20 (25) Block next turn.
Lose 3 Dexterity.

cards.name: Dented Bucket
cards.description: Deal 25 (30) damage. Whenever you use this card, permanently reduce its damage by 1.

cards.name: Electrolytes
cards.description:
Ethereal.
At the start of your turn, gain [E]. Whenever you play this card, permanently reduce its cost by 1. (Innate.)

cards.name: Extra Bucket
cards.description: Your Bucket cards are played 1 additional time.

cards.name: Glass Form
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain 3 (4) Thorns.

cards.name: Growing Pains
cards.description:
Deal 3 (5) damage.
Gain Calcium equal to unblocked damage dealt.

cards.name: Last Drop
cards.description:
Deal 40 (50) damage.
Lose 3 Strength.

cards.name: Multivitamins
cards.description:
(Retain.)
Deal 1 damage 6 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Pasteurize
cards.description:
Remove ALL debuffs.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Rear Cattle
cards.description: At the start of your turn, add 1 random Milk card to your hand.

cards.name: Trail of Glass
cards.description:
Gain 2 Thorns.
Gain Block equal to 2 (3) times your Thorns.

relics.name: Breakfast
relics.description: At the start of each battle, gain 3 Calcium.
relics.flavorText: The most important meal of the day.

relics.name: Cheese Wheel
relics.description: The first time you gain Calcium each turn, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: The way it rolls is mesmerising.

relics.name: Frozen Yogurt
relics.description: At the end of each turn, gain 2 Block for each retained card.

relics.name: Lasso
relics.description: At the start of each battle, add 3 random Milk cards to your hand.

relics.name: Butter Dish
relics.description: Your Calcium bonuses last for two turns instead of one.

relics.name: Mechanical Whisk
relics.description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, gain 2 Calcium.

relics.name: Whey Protein
relics.description: Every 10th card you play grants you 1 Strength and Dexterity.

relics.name: Big Breakfast
relics.description:
Replaces Breakfast relic.
At the start of each battle, gain 3 Strength and Dexterity.

relics.name: Spotted Fingernail
relics.description: Gain 1 [E] at the start of each turn. At the start of combat, shuffle 1 Calcium Deficiency curse into your deck.

relics.name: Whipped Cream
relics.description: If you play at least 4 cards in a turn, gain 1 [E] next turn.

relics.name: Glass Cafetiere
relics.description: Start each Elite encounter with 5 Thorns.

keywords.name: Calcium
keywords.description: Grants temporary Strength and Dexterity next turn.

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest should use _ to replace spaces and be entirely lowercase. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.

keywords.name: This is displayed in the tooltip.
keywords.description: This is displayed in the tooltip. Note, spaces are not allowed in NAMES. Also, they should be entirely lowercase. For multi-word keywords, see the next one.

keywords.name: Milk
keywords.description: Milk cards are 1-cost cards that Exhaust and add an Empty Bottle to your hand.

mods.name: The Milkman
mods.description: A sentient carton of milk, brought to life by the Spire. Uses abilities to grow stronger and empower future turns and battles.
